'''Install Driver for Belkin F8T016:''' 

'''Description:''' 
The Belkin F8T016 is very nearly working out of the box on Ubuntu Hardy
unfortunately the driver needs a parameter to work correctly.
'''Procedure:'''
* sudo nano /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist 
** blacklist hci_usb 
* sudo nano /etc/modules 
** hci_usb reset=1 
  
'''Comments:'''
=== v1 ===
Thats pretty much all there is to it, there is a patch available for bluez in later versions
